function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to natural environment","Impact":"Reduced mental health and well-being for occupants","Mitigation":"Create and maintain green infrastructure, provide access to green spaces","Technologies":"Green infrastructure planning, ecological value enhancement","People":"Occupants, residents","Owner":"Urban planners, developers"},{"Description":"Lack of inclusive and accessible facilities","Impact":"Exclusion of occupants from facilities, reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Develop inclusive and accessible facilities, consider safety measures for sports spaces","Technologies":"Inclusive design, safety measures for sports spaces","People":"Most occupants, residents","Owner":"Architects, designers, developers"}]}
